## Set Up with GitHub

###Use this to store your files as back up

#Install "usethis" package

```{r}
#install.packages("usethis")
```

#Call in "usegit" to save to GitHub

```{r}
#Usethis::use_git()


```

-   It will ask you if you want to commit? Yes & Definitely!

```{r}
usethis::use_github()

```
